Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 75th/Loomis
ShortDescription: EB 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Ashland and 76th due to, street blockage near 75th/Loomis.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Ashland and 76th due to, street blockage near 75th/Loomis.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #152 Addison Temporary Reroute near Addison/Clark
ShortDescription: 152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted, and Addison, due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted, and Addison, due to street blockage.
